com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleManagerConfig.DefaultScanFilter
    Enclosing class:
    BleManagerConfig

    public static interface BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter
    An optional whitelisting mechanism for scanning. Provide an implementation at BleManagerConfig.defaultScanFilter or one of the various BleManager.startScan() overloads, i.e. BleManager.startScan(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter), BleManager.startScan(Interval, BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter), etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please
      Small struct passed back from onEvent(ScanEvent).
      static class  BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent
      Instances of this class are passed to onEvent(ScanEvent) to aid in making a decision.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please onEvent(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent e)
      Return BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.acknowledge() to acknowledge the discovery, in which case BleManager.DiscoveryListener.onEvent(BleManager.DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent) will be called shortly.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please onEvent(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent e)
        Return BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.acknowledge() to acknowledge the discovery, in which case BleManager.DiscoveryListener.onEvent(BleManager.DiscoveryListener.DiscoveryEvent) will be called shortly. Otherwise return BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.ignore() to ignore the discovered device.
        Returns:
        BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.acknowledge(), BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.ignore(), or BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.Please.acknowledge(BleDeviceConfig) (or other static constructor methods that may be added in the future).
